front.title: Projet.FRA IDNA2008 related reports to the community

abstract.t: This Memo was sent to the IESG prior to their approval of the IDNAdocument set (except the "Mapping" WG consensual document) by theChair of Projet.FRA, a French speaking netspace. It is completed by acommunity report sent after ICANN launched their "FAST TRACK"project.
